refnamediv.refpurpose: Returns a list of available MGED commands along with a one-line usage message for each. If a command is supplied as an argument, the one-line usage message for that command is returned.

refsection.para: Returns a list of available MGED commands along with a one-line usage message for each. If a command is supplied as an argument, the one-line usage message for that command is returned. The helpdevel, helplib, ?, ?devel, and ?lib commands provide additional information on available commands.
The example shows the use of the help command to display a one-line usage message for a specific command.

info.title: Display a one-line usage message for a command.

listitem.para: Displays a one-line usage message for the ae command.
